justification: Candidate's leadership experience includes managing and leading multiple teams, exceeded expectations with innovative strategies, which aligns well with the leadership needs of the role.
Relevant experience in related roles is lacking, mainly in software engineering, not directly related to B2B sales or business development in IT and manufacturing, which impacts the experience score.
Sporadic mention of data analysis but focused primarily on machine learning, lacks specific market research experience relevant to the B2B sales role.
Lacks any demonstrable experience in B2B sales; candidate has mostly technical and software development experience.

requirements.criteria: 5+ years of experience in business development or sales
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
Proven ability to develop and implement successful business strategies

input.job_description:
### Join Apex Global Solutions as a Business Development Manager  

Apex Global Solutions is seeking a dedicated Business Development Manager to bolster our B2B sales efforts and enhance our market presence. This role requires a strategic thinker with the ability to forge and maintain robust client relationships, lead market analysis, and drive revenue growth through innovative sales strategies.

#### Key Responsibilities  
- Develop and implement strategic business development plans to meet organizational goals.
- Identify and qualify new business opportunities and partnerships.
- Lead market research to determine new market segments and customer needs.
- Foster long-term relationships with clients through successful engagement and collaboration.
- Track and report on key business metrics, providing insights and data-driven recommendations to executive leadership.
- Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment and excellence in service delivery.

#### Required Skills  
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proven experience in B2B sales and marketing, particularly in IT and manufacturing sectors.
- Proficient in market research and data analysis.
- Strong leadership and project management capabilities.

#### Benefits  
- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
- Health and wellness benefits package.
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment.

Join us to spearhead business growth initiatives that deliver significant value and drive our mission forward.
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: 5+ years of experience in business development or sales
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
Proven ability to develop and implement successful business strategies
input.resume:
Muhammad Haris Farooq
 harisf98@gmail.com • +92-313-9711001 • linkedin.com/in/haris-faroo  q   • github.com/Haarris
Professional Experience
i2c Inc.                                      Lahore, Pakistan
Software / AI Engineer (VoIP)                                                                      July 2021 – Present
Machine Learning  : Achieved 98% volume prediction accuracy with Time Series and Neural  
Networks and obtaining 91.7 F-1 Score in NLP sentiment analysis.
Software Development  : Designed Asterisk-compatible applications/dashboards in JavaScript,  
Java, and Python, trimming team overhead by 7%.
Asterisk Configuration:   Formulated and programmed dial plans for local PBX, IVR, and Call  
center servers in Asterisk 16.
Alerts  Automation:   Created  shell  and  Python  scripts  for  timely  error  detection,  boosting  
response time by 13% and error detection by 20%.
Databases  : Utilized MySQL expertise to craft efficient queries, saving 12% of time in weekly  
reporting tasks.
DIGIBLITZ                                Virginia, USA
Design and IoT Intern                                                                                                 July – Oct 2020
Front-end Designing  : Spearheaded circuit designing for smart products resulting in 6+ new  
features, a reduction of 12% bandwidth usage, and an increase in 4x battery life.
Cloud Management:   Initiated usage of cloud platforms and latest IoT trends to manipulate data  
that reduced equipment cost by 14% and accelerated time to launch by 23% resulting in an  
eventual $1,340 cost savings.
Technical Skills
Languages / Tools:  Python, C++, JavaScript, MySQL, Flask, SVN, Git, Asterisk.
Libraries  /  Framework:  TensorFlow,  Open  CV,  Pandas,  Numpy,  Matplotlib,  Keras,  NLP,  
Scikit-Learn, Nagios, SIP, RTP, Nagios, NLTK, TF-IDF, SVM, Naive Bayes
Machine Learning: Time Series (ARIMA, SARIMAX), Regression Modeling (Linear, Logistic 
Regularized), Clustering (K-Means), Neural Network (CNN, LSTM), Forecasting (Call Volume, 
Financial), Supervised Learning, Hyper-parameter Tuning, Sentiment Analysis,  Model 
Evaluation (Train-Test Split, Evaluation Metrics: MAE, MSE, F1-score.  AWS, SVN,REST,Java,SVM,RNN,Bayesian,Process
Projects
Future Volume Predictions (Time Series Forecasting and Machine Learning – Python):
Applied Time series using ARIMA and SARIMAX, LSTM models, probability and Machine  
learning techniques to estimate the future calls, SMS and other relevant information efficiently  
by up to 98% that provided better future events planning.
Sentiment Analysis (Natural Language Processing (NLP – Python): 
Conducted advanced hybrid sentiment analysis using RNN-LSTM, Word2Vec, Naive Bayes,  
logistic regression, lexicon scoring, TF-IDF, SVM, achieving an exceptional F-1 Score of 91.7.  
Enhanced  agent  performance  by  17%  through  sentiment-driven  training,  resulting  in  a  
remarkable 76% boost in customer satisfaction via sentiment-based routing
Autonomous  Luggage  Carrier  (Sensor  Fusion  +  Computer  Vision  –  Python):
In university FYP, implemented sensor fusion (magnetometer, accelerometer, gyrometer) with  
Python for MobileNetV2 and OpenCV-enhanced computer vision for image object detection.  This effort resulted in a significant 25% cost reduction and a noteworthy 12% increase in  
operational efficiency, outperforming competitors.
Web Development (Python, Flask API, HTML and CSS):  
Developed a Flask API to handle data gathering for Machine Learning analysis (Time Series),  
and used Flask to render an HTML web page to display forecasted values and appropriate  
plots. This project included creating multiple endpoints from gathering data to customizing the  
forecasting with user inputs.
Development of Monitoring Dashboards (Java, JavaScript and HTML): 
Utilized both back-end and front-end technologies to create a dashboard showcasing call,  
queue, and CPU statistics, resulting in a 13% reduction in team resource time while offering  
visually appealing insights.
Call Back Feature (Asterisk): 
Designed and implemented the callback feature in order to reduce the queue wait time by 35%  
during peak hours. This project included developing new routing plans in asterisk and python  
and shell scripts that eventually resulted in up to 70% less waiting time for customer.
Education
National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences (FAST – NUCES)           
Islamabad, Pakistan        July 2017- July 2021
BS in Electrical (Telecommunication) Engineering  
Relevant Coursework:  Data Communication & Networks, Object-Oriented Programming, Wireless &  
Mobile Communication, Introduction to IoT, Probability, Linear Algebra, Multi Variable Calculus.
Awards
Emerging Software Engineer of the Year 2022 (IT Department – i2c Inc.)  
Dean’s Honor List (Spring’18, Fall’19, Spring’20, Fall’20)
Silver Medalist (Fall’20) 
Huawei ICT Competition 2020:
Qualified for regional finals and was named in the top 20 participants from Pakistan.
   Certifications
Huawei Certified Internetwork Associate – Artificial Intelligence ( HCIA – AI)
Huawei Certified Internetwork Associate – Internet of Things ( HCIA – IoT) 
Huawei Certified Internetwork Associate – Routing and Switching ( HCIA – R&S) 
Leadership 
NATIONAL UNIVERSITY ENGINEERING SOCIETY
Vice President                                        Oct 2020 – June 2021
Led  a  diverse  17-member  team  across  finance,  social  media,  marketing,  events,  and  
operations, successfully orchestrating 10+ events with 100+ participants each while optimizing  
budgets through a 6% reduction in miscellaneous charges.
FAST COMMUNITY SERVICES SOCIETY   
Vice President                                                   Jan – Oct 2020
